attributes.action: The Government should start taking notice of these petitions
attributes.additional_details:
So, the Government has put together this lovely little website as another in a long line of ploys, designed to trick us (the people) into thinking they occasionally care slightly about what's best for us.

This website is a great way of collecting all us pesky taxpayers, who actually expect something in return, in one place so they can ignore as many of us as possible and get back to more urgent matters like, destroying charities, bringing down the NHS, selling out policies to the highest bidders, socializing with notorious criminals etc.

I've seen (and signed) a fair few of these petitions but, as with any attempt to get the Government to listen to us, usually, nothing happens.

The aim of this petition is to let the Government know that we're onto them... assuming of course anyone reads it, which is unlikely.
